definition: to repay/to compensate for/to recompense/to fulfill (hopes etc)

sentences.english: What then is the idea of vapid and obligation-free body baring?
sentences.chinese: 那麼，無趣而無償的裸露，又有什麼意思呢？

sentences.english: Guests can also free use the brandnew hot spring baths with a appointment.
sentences.chinese: 住宿貴賓可不限次數預約無償使用全新私人風呂湯屋。

sentences.english: Objective To know the blood quality of free blood donation in Zhangjiajie City.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解張家界市無償獻血的血液質量。

sentences.english: Non-remunerated blood donation, both for the people of today, for tomorrow we have.
sentences.chinese: 無償獻血，既爲今天的別人，又爲明天的我們。

sentences.english: Now I am semi-retired, but that is no reason why I am expected to offer myself without any remuneration.
sentences.chinese: 現在雖然是半退休，但沒有理由完全無償奉獻。

sentences.english: Today, , I participated in the "unpaid blood donation into campus" activity.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我參加了造“無償獻血進校園”活動。

sentences.english: It tells you that you cannot get energy for free out of your force field.
sentences.chinese: 就意味着你不可能在力場裏面無償地得到能量。

sentences.english: Blood donation is good for the people, family and nation.
sentences.chinese: 無償獻血，利國利民利家。

sentences.english: We will provide tutorial assistance at no charge.
sentences.chinese: 我們將無償提供個別輔導。

sentences.english: He’s doing a month’s unpaid work experience with an engineering firm.
sentences.chinese: 他正在一家工程公司無償工作一個月以獲得工作經驗。

sentences.english: My dear friends, faced with such fact, what do you think of non-remunerated blood donation?
sentences.chinese: 親愛的朋友們，面對如此現象，你怎麼看無償獻血呢？

sentences.english: In Hong Kong, blood donation programme was first introduced by the Red Cross back in 1952.
sentences.chinese: 香港紅十字會於1952年推行自願無償捐血計劃。

sentences.english: To evaluate the function of health education in voluntary blood donation.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價獻血健康教育在無償獻血中的作用。

sentences.english: The gratuitous nature of the revenue determines that the tax payment is a net outgoing of the enterprises' fiancés.
sentences.chinese: 稅收的無償性決定了稅款的支付是企業資金的淨流出。

sentences.english: But then, why should it give out information for nothing?
sentences.chinese: 但是，爲什麼它能無償提供信息？

sentences.english: Please participate in unpaid blood donation in order to contribute your love to society and others.
sentences.chinese: 爲社會做貢獻，爲他人獻愛心，請參加無償獻血。

definition: to fund/to put money into sth/to invest
collective (decision)/joint (effort)/a group/a team/en masse/as a group
to act as/used erroneously for 作為|作为
